item.title: CVE-2023-3113|2024-08-02T06:48:07.103Z -- lenovo -- lenovo%20xclarity%20administrator
item.description: An unauthenticated XML external entity injection (XXE) vulnerability exists in LXCA's Common Information Model (CIM) server that could result in read-only access to specific files.
